::Ramulus/Striker/Mosquitor::

Mosquitor yells in rage as shots tear through his stomach, draining his 
already low energy levels. With an insane yell, he pulls out his sword, 
jumping at DarkMouse with the sword stabbing downwards.

When Mosquitor's sword's tip is inches from DarkMouse, a shape launches 
itself from the bushes, slamming it's foot across the predacon's face.

Ramulus lands, grinning with the excitement of battle as he sees Mosquitor 
fall to the ground unconscious, the predacon's sword falling harmlessly near 
him.

Ramulus takes out his double-slagmaker cannon, aiming it at Counter Punch and 
firing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker slams through a tree as the shots hit him. He stands up, his chest 
shooting sparks and his face plate burned only to be hit by the debree from 
Shockwave's missiles. He looks around at DarkMouse, Ramulus, and the other 
maximals in the area, and, deciding that they had a chance, turns to fire at 
Injector.
